title: Forge1.10.2-12.18.3.2221加载mod崩溃
author: 夏_Sunset
txt_content: 最近做了一个1.10.2的整合包，调试时Minecraft崩溃，不清楚具体原因，请大家帮忙分析一下qwq 详细信息Forge版本：1.10.2-12.18.3.221 JVM参数：-Xmx3G -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -Xmn128M复制代码 Mod列表AetherII-1.10.2-r1-build7.signed.jar AmbientSounds v1.1.3 mc1.9.4＆1.10.x.zip Bagginses-1.10.2-3.0.4g.jar BetterFps-1.3.2.jar BiomesOPlenty-1.10.2-5.0.0.2109-universal.jar boatlantern-0.2.1.jar cfm-4.1.1-mc1.10.2.jar CreativeCore v1.6.3 mc1.10.2.jar DynamicLights-1.10.2.jar DynamicSurroundings-1.10.2-3.2.1.1.jar Hwyla-1.8.1-B13_1.10.2.jar infinityLib-0.1.jar ItemPhysic Full 1.3.3 mc1.10.2.jar iUpStudio-1.27-1.10.2mods.zip jei_1.10.2-3.14.2.401.jar Joshua's Christmas Mod 1.10.2.jar journeymap-1.10.2-5.4.4.jar MCA-1.10.2-5.2.3-universal.jar NaturesCompass-1.10.2-1.3.0.jar OptiFine_1.10.2_HD_U_D6.jar placeableitems-3.0.2.3 for 1.10.2.jar RadixCore-1.10.2-2.1.3-universal.jar StatCraft-1.4.jar TimeZone-0.3.2.jar ToughAsNails-1.9.4-1.0.11.jar VeinMiner-1.9-0.35.3.595+a46c1b0.jar Villagebox-1.10.2-0.5.0.jar 复制代码 Crash-Report---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- WARNING: coremods are present:   FarseekCoreMod (Farseek-1.9.4-2.1.jar)   DynamicSurroundingsCore (DynamicSurroundings-1.10.2-3.2.1.1.jar)   TimeZone (TimeZone-0.3.2.jar)   TANLoadingPlugin (ToughAsNails-1.9.4-1.0.11.jar)   DLFMLCorePlugin (DynamicLights-1.10.2.jar)   ItemPatchingLoader (ItemPhysic Full 1.3.3 mc1.10.2.jar)   CreativePatchingLoader (CreativeCore v1.6.3 mc1.10.2.jar) Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge // Don't do that. Time: 1/25/17 2:40 PM Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from Minecraft Comes Alive (MCA) Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Caught fatal exception and stopped the game. replies.txt_content:
Minecraft Comes Alive
此mod导致的问题
尝试删除后重新启动

replies.author: 夏_Sunset
replies.txt_content:
jxudvv 发表于 2017-1-25 15:05
Minecraft Comes Alive
